good: Excellent centering of the art within the green cup.
Clear contrast between the bright white microfoam and the golden-brown crema.
Silky milk texture with minimal visible large bubbles.
The natural sunlight highlights the warm tones of the beverage and the wooden background.
improve: The definition of the internal layers could be sharper to avoid a slightly blurred look.
Improve symmetry by ensuring the tilt of the cup is perfectly level as the pattern expands.
The base of the heart/tulip is a bit rounded; a more defined point would enhance the shape.
tips: Try a slightly more aggressive wiggle at the start of the pour to create more distinct ripples.
Focus on a steady, slow flow rate to prevent the layers from merging together.
Lift the pitcher higher at the end for the final pull-through to create a thinner, cleaner center line.
